Body.Content:
We are announcing the Public Preview of the modern hierarchy security setting URL redirection. This feature will begin rolling out by region starting February 15, 2024, with completion by February 28.

How does this affect me?
The modern hierarchy security setting interface is available to users that have access to the hierarchy security setting in the Dynamics 365 portal. The legacy UI will still be available through a link in the Power Platform admin center.

What do I need to do to prepare?
Review our documentation on hierarchy security in Power Platform. If you would like to give us feedback on this feature, youâ€™ll have the opportunity to provide it on this page.

Title: Modern hierarchy security setting redirection is now available in Public Preview
